Class Quizlet

java.lang.Object
Quizlet
public class Quizlet
extends java.lang.Object
DATE: January 12, 2021 This is a simple application that allows the user to review for the OCA JAVA SE8 Programmer I Certification Exam This program has two features: first, it lets the user review java concepts before taking the quiz. Second, is it has a multiple choice quiz that prepares the user for the certification exam

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  Quizlet.Question
    This interface initializes an array of type string
    static class  Quizlet.QuestionAttributes
    This class extends the QuestionDecorator method This class does the following: first, it initializes an array of String it also checks for exceptions - errors its main purpose is it builds a decorator that takes input from files

    Main method calls the clrscr method generates asccii art asks input from the user whether they would like to review first or take the quiz
